comment.author: Dominique
comment.text: The First Lady calls Trump disrespectful to women, but yet Hillary is still married to someone that disrespected women. What Donald said locker room banter, all us guys have talked that way between buddies and I would bet even Obama did. It's only talk, whereas Bill Clinton's was action. I did a survey asking 100 guys if they have ever talked about women in this way, as to boast their ego. 95% said yes but assured it was just bragging and not true, as it was only talk.

replies.text: Cameron what about Bill's? Hillary is still married to him. What does that say about Hillary?
